name: Malignance
simpleDescription: Partner with an ally to protect each other

passives.name: Hatefog
passives.effects: Dealing ability damage to enemy champions with your ultimate ability creates a +251;251.8;253.1;255.5;259.8;267.3;280.7;304.2;345.9;419.7;550 ultimate's damage instance radius scorched zone beneath them for 3 seconds, applying a Curse to enemies within that deals 15% attack speed (+ 1.25% AP) magic damage every 0.25s seconds (180% attack speed (+ 15% AP) total magic damage over the duration) and reduces their magic resistance by 10 (3 second cooldown per target, starts on zone creation).
